name: SQL VM HUB and PAYG Example

content.query:
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyActualCost/2024*/Extended_v3_ACMMonthlyActualCost_*.parquet/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where ResourceId = '/subscriptions/8b96ae86-c1d5-4668-bf1c-e1b120b18b17/resourceGroups/S077-NOE-EMI-TST/providers/Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/S077WEMID1T'
    and [Date] in ('2024-01-07', '2024-01-08', '2024-01-09')
